StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: RECREATE_STRINGREPCACHE
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE UIM_DI01.RECREATE_STRINGREPCACHE
IS
BEGIN
FOR rec IN (SELECT c.id FROM cs_class c, cs_class_attr a WHERE c.id = a.class_id AND a.attr_key = 'tostringcache') LOOP
recreate_stringrepcache_class(rec.id);
END LOOP;
END;
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.body:
CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE UIM_DI01.RECREATE_STRINGREPCACHE
IS
BEGIN
FOR rec IN (SELECT c.id FROM cs_class c, cs_class_attr a WHERE c.id = a.class_id AND a.attr_key = 'tostringcache') LOOP
recreate_stringrepcache_class(rec.id);
END LOOP;
END;
